snippet: The Big Ten, Pacific-12 and Southeastern conferences are following the N.C.A.A.’s lead and will no longer allow E.A. Sports to use league logos in its college football video games.
abstract: Big Ten, Pacific-12 and Southeastern conferences are following the NCAA’s lead and will no longer allow Electronic Arts to use league logos in its college football video games.
lead_paragraph: The Big Ten, Pacific-12 and Southeastern conferences are following the N.C.A.A.’s lead and will no longer allow E.A. Sports to use league logos in its college football video games.

headline.main: Conferences Ending Ties to E.A. Sports
headline.print_headline: Conferences Ending Ties to E.A. Sports
